sentences.en: I never saw such a glaring example of misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这样一个明显歪曲事实的例子。

sentences.en: I wish to point out your misrepresentation of the facts.
sentences.cn: 我想指出你们对事实的曲解。

sentences.en: So which was it, misperception, misrepresentation, or misallocation?
sentences.cn: 那么误读，歪曲，抑或是分配不当到底谁是罪魁祸首呢？
